tagline.en: Build mutual trust world on EOS!
tagline.zh: 在 EOS 上建立互信世界！

introduce.en: We are dedicated to bringing EOS to the masses. The best way to achieve widespread adoption is through useful, fun, and well-designed products that showcase the best of the EOS platform. And also build and share our tools with the EOS developer community.
introduce.zh: 我们将致力于让更多人参与到 EOS 生态中来。我们认为最好的方式是创建对普通人来说有用、有趣、设计精美的产品，将 EOS 平台的特点发挥到极致。同时我们将创建并共享我们的开发工具给 EOS 开发者社区。
